description: Add a trailer classification to a job production plan.
permissions: User must be authorized to create/update the related job production plan; access is delegated to job production plan permissions.
side_effects: Touches related broker tender job schedule shifts after commit.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --trailer-classification are required. Trailer classification must be unique per job production plan. trailer-classification-equivalent-ids cannot include the primary trailer classification and must refer to existing trailer classifications. gross-weight-legal-limit-lbs-explicit must be greater than 0 when provided. explicit-material-transaction-tons-max must be greater than 0 and less than 100 when provided.

flags.name: --trailer-classification-equivalent-ids
flags.description: Equivalent trailer classification IDs (comma-separated or repeated)

flags.name: --gross-weight-legal-limit-lbs-explicit
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided. Example: --gross-weight-legal-limit-lbs-explicit 80000

flags.name: --explicit-material-transaction-tons-max
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 and less than 100 when provided. Example: --explicit-material-transaction-tons-max 20
